content: While we lose many landmarks of life as time goes by, one aspect that seemingly will remain forever: black bellyaching. The “disdain” that Derrius Quarles has “faced” in the workplace could EASILY be solved: * find employment in a black-owned business that has predominately black employees * start his own business, simultaneously accomplishing making a saleable product while making a profit, against the pounding of government hurdles being hurtled at the company from a million directions * just do your job and be acceptable of other people (rather than attempt to control their behavior).
